metadata.name: Waves / Room-A
metadata.description:
This artwork is part of the "Museum of Light" series.

About the museum:
"Museum of Light" is museum with a theme of light built in the mountains. It consists of several large and small art spaces, and the artworks exhibited are changed according to the season.

About the space:
In the center of this space, a huge cylindrical monitor with a diameter of 60ft and a height of 344ft stands tall. The videos projected on this monitor illuminate every corner of the vast space.

About the light work:
The waves of light that rush in illuminate the space, and their movement creates changes in shade.
We recognize the shape of a wave by the collection of bubbles. In the same way, these light waves are made up of a vast number of light particles.

Spec:
-Time: 00:11 (Loop)
-Resolution: 2048 x 2048 px
-Frame Rate: 30fps
